name: Pakhan
thoughts: Good damage roll. I'd re-roll Talented for Ferorious or Determined. If you run a skill build, keep it like that.

name: Liberator
thoughts: Excellent damage roll. I'd re-roll Capable for Destructive. If you can't unlock Predatory is not worth buying.

name: MG5
thoughts: Awesome damage roll with the talents for a Tac Link Lone Star build. I'd buy another one to re-roll Commanding for Ferocious. If you have PxC to spare. Re-rolling a third one to get Predatory on it will get you an awesome dual MG5 pair. Must buy.

name: Officer's M9 A1
thoughts: Nothing special but it's a pistol with Coolheaded.

name: Marine Super 90
thoughts: The damage roll is really bad but if you want to run a dual Super 90 Lone Star build, this one is excellent and you optimize the damage. I'd re-roll Brutal for Destructive and buy 2 of them.

name: Liberator
thoughts: Great damage roll. Talents are better suited for PvP. Buy it if you can't find a better AR. I'd re-roll Skilled for Competent.

name: Navy MP-5 N
thoughts: Maximum damage roll but talents are not optimal. I'd re-roll Brutal for Destructive or Responsive.

name: Lightweight M4
thoughts: Good damage roll. The talents are best used with a skill build or as a secondary utility weapon. I'd re-roll Self-preserved for Destructive.

name: Double Barrel Sawed Off Shotgun
thoughts: If you're looking for an utility Sawed Off with good talents this one is great. I'd re-roll Self-preserved for Determined or Predatory depending on your build.

name: M700 Carbon
thoughts: Average damage roll but good talents. I'd re-roll Intense for Ferocious, Prepared or Coolheaded.

name: Compensator
thoughts: Good buy if you're looking for stability on the muzzle. These are good for LMGs.

name: Large Suppressor - FDE
thoughts: Good rolls CHD, Accuracy and CHC.

name: PEQ-15 Laser - Orange
thoughts: Good rolls to use in the under barrel slot if you want a tigher reticle. Specially useful with fast firing MMRs and the MDR without giving out HSD in the scope and muzzle.

name: Angled Grip
thoughts: If you want stability in the underbarrel, these rolls are good but automatic weapons.

name: Inventive Backpack
thoughts: Almost max armor with high Electronics. I'd re-roll CHD to Skill Power.

name: Tactician Gloves
thoughts: If you need Tactician gloves for a 4pc set or a Ninjabike build, these are a good buy. I'd re-roll LMG for AR Damage.

name: Firearms Mod
thoughts: If you missed out on the FA DtE mods last week you can use these until you get better ones.

name: Firearms Mod
thoughts: Max FA and haste mods for a number of builds.

name: Stamina Mod
thoughts: Not 4% but still good Stam DtE mods for pve builds.

name: Performance Mod
thoughts: Max seeker mine damage mods, great for electronics builds.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: God roll for electronics builds, must buy.
